Post: "I guess I'm just not enough for anyone. Maybe it's my insecurities or maybe I'm just too blind to see the signs. Either way, I seem to attract people who don't want to be honest with me."

Post: "I always seem to attract these ambiguous relationships because I'm just not good at setting boundaries or maybe I'm too afraid of being alone, and it's hard for me to say no to people who show me attention."
